text: Noddu (yimɓe ɓen) kisan; ñiiɓiraa no yamiraɗaa non, wata a jokku mbeleeɗe maɓɓe ɗen, maakaa: "Mi gomɗinii ko Allah jippini kon (fow) e Defte, mi yamiraama kadi, nunɗugol hakkunde mon. Allah woni Joomi amen e Joomi mon. Ko menen golle amen woodani, ko onon kadi golle mon woodani. Yeddondiral woo alaa hakkunde amen e mon. Allah mooɓoyay e denndaandal. Ko ka Makko woni ruttorde nden
